# Name Email Actions
{{ picture.id }} {{ picture.alt }} {{ picture.url }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-picture-page', templateUrl: './picture-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./picture-page.component.css'] }) export class PicturePageComponent { pictures: any[] = []; constructor(private http: HttpClient) {} fetchUrlContent(url: string) { this.http.get(url, { responseType: 'text' }) .subscribe( data => { console.log(data); // Log the fetched content }, error => { console.error(error); // Log any errors that occur during the request } ); } }
